resources.string:
Hi, my name is Silvana. 

I love dance and fish. 

The kind that is alive and swims around in an aquarium or river, or a lake, and for definitely the ocean. 
Fun fact is that I have a several aquariums and also a river. 

I like eating fish, too, Raw fish. Grilled fish. Smoked fish. Poached fish - not so much 
And sometimes i even go fishing 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

Once., whe i was camping in Canada, and very hungry, i even caught a large slmon with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own aquarium. 
You should as someone else about fishing, though.
